How to play the game?


The main purpose of the game is to direct the purple gunk
from the magenta square inlet to the teal square outlet

How to do so?
Start by just clicking one pipe and another one to swap their positions!

There are 3 different speed options: press spacebar to increase the speed!
For advanced players; press enter to enter hyperdrive mode!

Due to the energy consumption of the hyperdrive;
one needs to wait for it to warm up before it triggers
